restaurantId.placeholder: Please specify an unique Restaurant ID
restaurantId.tooshort: Restaurant ID must have at least five characters.
restaurantId.invalid: Invalid ID. You can use only alphabets and numbers.

editRestaurant.businessHourDescription: Check the business day of the week and set the business hours.
editRestaurant.updateMapDescription: Set restaurant location from your restaurant name and address.

editMenu.itemOptionsNote: For altenatives, use comma to separate them (e.g., "Chiken, Pork, Tofu")

order.pleaseStay: Please stay on this page. The order status will be updated below.

sms.notice: A SMS message will be sent for the verification.
sms.typeVerificationCode: Please type the code you've received
sms.auth/invalid-verification-code: The SMS verification code used to create the phone auth credential is invalid. Please resend the verification code sms and be sure use the verification code provided by the user.
sms.auth/missing-verification-code: The phone auth credential was created with an empty SMS verification code.

auth.notAdmin: You need to login as a restaurant owner.

admin.hidePayment: Payment feature is coming soon. Please stay tuned.
admin.name: First & last name
admin.addYourRestaurant: Please add your restaurant from the bottom button.
admin.pleaseConnectPayment: Please connect your payment account from the bottom button.
admin.pleaseSignUp: Sign up as a new user
admin.pleaseCheckInbox: Please check your inbox, an email is on the way.

order.cancelMessage: Please contact to the customer and tell the order will be canceled.

email.taken: The email address is already in use by another account.

password.tooshort: Password should be at least 6 characters

code.auth/user-not-found: There is no user record corresponding to this identifier.
code.auth/too-many-requests: Too many unsuccessful login attempts. Please try again later.
code.auth/invalid-email: The email address is badly formatted.
